title: Singapore Games Association(SGGA) CMS customised website
description:
A full-featured CMS web portal built with Django, PostGreSQL, Docker and Wagtail.
Includes payment processing and admin dashboard.

title: Portfolio Website
description:
Modern portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS.
Features multi-language support.

title: JSL geature recognition AI model
description:
An ongoing project to develop an AI model for Japanese Sign Language gesture recognition.
Project objective: To familiarize with the various machine learning techniques and models.
